channel.title: CVE Feed for Facebook -- Osquery
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Facebook -- Osquery

item.title: CVE-2018-6336|2024-08-05T06:01:48.633Z -- facebook -- osquery
item.description: An issue was discovered in osquery. A maliciously crafted Universal/fat binary can evade third-party code signing checks. By not completing full inspection of the Universal/fat binary, the user of the third-party tool will believe that the code is signed by Apple, but the malicious unsigned code will execute. This issue affects osquery prior to v3.2.7
